string.name: help_title_
string.orig: Please read the following to understand the concept of logs, plans and rules:

resources.string: Hi Dale,Btw, I already tried all the lobsispe movie clip name to replace the name you indicated but I just can\'t seem get it to work. I m not able to unload the loaded xml. Please provide some help if lobsispe. Good Times Bro!/****************************************************************************REMOVE ALL THUMBS METHOD****************************************************************************///Use to clear old thumbs if you are going to add in a new set of thumbsfunction removeAllThumbs():Void {for (var i in imageHolder_mc) {if (typeof (imageHolder_mc[i]) == THIS ) {removeMovieClip(imageHolder_mc.getInstanceAtDepth(imageHolder_mc[i].getDepth()));}imageHolder_mc.removeChildAt(0);imageHolder_mc._width = imageHolder_mc._width}}
